    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Longueurs d'onde des couleurs de la lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Wavelengths of light colours</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlängen der hellen Farben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Wavelengths de cores claras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lunghezze d'onda dei colori chiari</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μήκη κύματος των ελαφριών χρωμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Longitudes de onda de colores ligeros</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme d'un spectre montre que le rouge a la  plus longue longueur d'onde et le violet ayant la longueur d'onde la plus courte.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram of a spectrum shows red having the longest wavelength and violet having the shortest wavelength.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">couleurs</string>
            <string language="en">colours</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rouge</string>
            <string language="en">red</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">spectre</string>
            <string language="en">spectrum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">violette</string>
            <string language="en">violet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">longueurs d'onde</string>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm eines Spektrums zeigt Rotes, die 
längste Wellenlänge habend und Violettes, die kürzeste Wellenlänge
habend.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama de um spectrum mostra vermelho 
tendo o wavelength o mais longo e violeta tendo o wavelength o mais 
curto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema di uno spettro mostra rosso avendo 
la lunghezza d'onda più lunga e viola avendo la lunghezza d'onda più
corta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ενός φάσματος εμφανίζει κόκκινο 
έχοντας το πιό μακροχρόνιες μήκος κύματος και τη βιολέτα που 
έχουν το πιό σύντομο μήκος κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama de un espectro muestra rojo teniendo
la longitud de onda más larga y violeta teniendo la longitud de onda 
más corta.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Farben</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
